author: Ted Byrne
content:
No, it is not spooky... it is ominous. What a sinister cinematic quality you've captured. It is deep story telling. I like it when you do that.

Hmmm... just read Birtch's comments. Great minds and all of that... Glad he agrees that I am dead-on in my feelings. You've made me wonder here.

Wonder is a good thing.

Thanks...
